page.title: 11ARTS CRAFTS AND HOBBIES
page.content: Langham Leisure,a non-profit making organisation was set up to create interest in the village and to show how many arts and crafts were represented amongst the villagers. Later LACE-Langham Arts and Crafts Enterprise-began which brings together craftsmen from the area with a wide variety of skills.An annual exhibition and sale is held in Langham School on the Mayday Bank Holiday.This year thirty-two villagers entered work including needlework,crotchet,knitting soft and wooden toys,furniture,photo- graphy and jewelry.Over eight-hundred members of the public visited the event which included an exhibition of local children's art which reflected Langham's "Tidy Village" Campaign.
